svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Cancer death rates in the United States over the long-run
Age-standardized death rates from various forms of cancer in males and females, measured as the number of deaths
per 100,000 individuals. Age-standardization is based on normalisation to the standard US population structure in the
